name: misalignment
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an arrangement in which the parts of a machine or structure do not fit together correctly, which causes problems: It could be that the car came out of the factory with a slight misalignment. I suffer spinal misalignment, which causes me daily pain.
a situation in which parts of a system are different, so the system does not work well: The squeeze is a result of a classic misalignment between supply and demand.
More examplesFewer examplesThe problematic symptoms tend to disappear once the misalignment is corrected.The derailment was caused by a misalignment of the rails.The contamination is a sign of a misalignment of machinery or an obstruction. I see things one way and they see things a different way. That misalignment between the CEO and the board is unhealthy.
